trans-unit.source: Specifies how conflicting changes to the data source will be detected and resolved.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como as alterações conflitantes na fonte de dados serão detectadas e resolvidas.

trans-unit.source: Update and delete statements will include all searchable columns from the table in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Update e Delete incluirão todas as colunas pesquisáveis da tabela na cláusula WHERE.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to specifying <see langword="CompareAllValuesUpdate" /> | <see langword="CompareAllValuesDelete" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente a especificar <see langword="CompareAllValuesUpdate" /> | <see langword="CompareAllValuesDelete" />.

trans-unit.source: If any Timestamp columns exist in the table, they are used in the WHERE clause for all generated update statements.
trans-unit.target: Se houver colunas Carimbo de Data/Hora na tabela, elas serão usadas na cláusula WHERE de todas as instruções de atualização geradas.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to specifying <see langword="CompareRowVersionUpdate" /> | <see langword="CompareRowVersionDelete" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente a especificar <see langword="CompareRowVersionUpdate" /> | <see langword="CompareRowVersionDelete" />.

trans-unit.source: All update and delete statements include only <see cref="P:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey" /> columns in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: Todas as instruções UPDATE e DELETE incluem apenas colunas <see cref="P:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey" /> na cláusula WHERE.

trans-unit.source: If no <see cref="P:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey" /> is defined, all searchable columns are included in the WHERE clause.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <see cref="P:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey" /> for definido, todas as colunas pesquisáveis serão incluídas na cláusula WHERE.

trans-unit.source: This is equivalent to <see langword="OverwriteChangesUpdate" /> | <see langword="OverwriteChangesDelete" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso é equivalente a <see langword="OverwriteChangesUpdate" /> | <see langword="OverwriteChangesDelete" />.
